Number of people living in the house
You are creating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, from driving. Try taking transits.
Your driving is creating %f kg of CO2 emissions, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Try car pooling.
Your car trips are generating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Try getting an electric car.
Your driving is creating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Consider using cruise control.
You are generating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, from driving. Remember to remove excessive weight from your car.
%f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, is generated from your driving. Combine errands to make fewer trips.
You are creating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, from driving. Consider getting a fuel efficient car.
Your driving is creating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Consider walking or riding a bike.
Your electricity usage is producing %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Try unplugging unused electronic devices
You are making %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, from electricity. Try shutting off lights when not in use and consider taking shorter showers.
Your electricity usage is making %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Try installing solar panels.
Your energy usage is creating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Consider putting your computers in sleep mode when they are not in use.
Your energy usage is generating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Try doing your laundry with cold water, and remember to change air filters frequently.
%f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, is created from your electricity usage. Consider switching to LED light bulbs.
Your energy usage is generating %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage. Try using your microwave over your oven when possible.
%f kg of CO2 emission, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, comes from your energy usage. Consider managing your thermostat so your heater does not operate too often.

You drove %d times so far, When possible, walk or ride your bike in order to avoid carbon emissions completely. Carpooling and public transportation drastically reduce CO2 emissions by spreading them out over many riders.

You produce %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, from home application. A better concept is probably ‘embodied energy’, which takes account of all the carbon, water and energy that goes into producing any food or manufactured item.

Drive a low carbon-emission vehicle. You drove %d km on Highways and cities, High mileage doesn’t always mean low CO2 emissions. All vehicles have an estimated miles-per-gallon rating. Electric cars emit almost no CO2 in Canada.
Get a hitch-mounted cargo rack. Do not buy a minivan or SUV if you do not need 4WD and/or will only occasionally need the extra space since you drove SUV %d times
You drove %d kn on highways. Speeding and unnecessary acceleration reduce mileage by up to 33/100, waste gas and money, and increase your carbon footprint.
Insulate and seal your home. You produced %f CO2 from home, Reduce drafts and air leaks with caulk, insulation, and weather stripping.
You drove %d KM on city,Being stuck in traffic wastes gas and unneccessarily creates CO2. Use traffic websites and apps and go a different way or wait.
You have used Bus and Skytrain as your daily transportation %d times! Keep it up!
You have entered %d journeys; want to enter more?
You entered %d utility bills; want to add more?
You have not entered a journey today; want to enter one now?
You have not entered utility in over a month and a half; want to enter one now?
Insulate and seal your home. You produced %f kg of CO2, equivalent to %f kg of regular garbage, from home application. Reduce drafts and air leaks with caulk, insulation, and weather stripping.
You drove %d km in cities. Being stuck in traffic wastes gas and unnecessarily creates CO2. Use traffic websites and apps to pick different route.
You have ridden buses and skytrains as your daily transportation %d times! Keep it up!
